body_html:
$ bazel test --test_output=all --jobs=1 --runs_per_test=1000 --test_sharding_strategy=disabled -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:map_stage_op_test //tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:stage_op_test

...

//tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:stage_op_test                           PASSED in 3.0s

I don't see anything in 1000 runs on either stage_op_test or map_stage_op_test. With what frequency are you seeing hangs?
